patterns: what are the medical services you offer

responses: We offer a wide range of medical services, including general medicine, pediatrics, obstetrics and gynecology, surgery, internal medicine, orthopedics, cardiology, neurology, dermatology, radiology, laboratory services, and pharmacy.

patterns: what is the personnel's contact info?
responses: You can contact us at 123-456-7890 or via email at info@healthcarecenter.com. Our address is 123 Main Street, City, State, ZIP Code.
Our opening hours are as follows: Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM, Sunday: Closed.

patterns: when can I visit the General Medicine department?
What are the working hours for the Pediatrics department?
availability of the Obstetrics and Gynecology department
can you provide the schedule for the Surgery department?
when is the Cardiology department open?
responses: The General Medicine department is open from Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM.
The Pediatrics department operates on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
The Obstetrics and Gynecology department is available on Tuesday and Thursday from 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM.
The Surgery department is open for consultations and procedures from Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM.
The Cardiology department operates on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
